tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    body_temperature FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE health_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  steps_count INT,
  calories_burned FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure INT,
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE activity_level (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    steps_count INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    distance_covered FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE health_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    recommendation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VitalSigns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
    body_temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthMetrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT,
    bmi FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthReports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES UserProfiles(id),
    report_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs
(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  heart_rate INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE health_metrics
(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  weight FLOAT,
  height FLOAT,
  bmi FLOAT,
  body_fat_percentage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles
(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE health_conditions
(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  condition_name VARCHAR(50),
  severity ENUM('mild', 'moderate', 'severe'),
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments
(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  status ENUM('scheduled', 'cancelled', 'completed')
);
